Verses: 1 pinbu Aval Maamiyaagiya Nagomi Avalai Nokki: En Magale, Nee Sugamaai Vaazhndhirukkumbadi Naan Unakku Savukkiyaththai Thedaadhiruppeno?
2 nee Povaasin Velaikkaarigalode Koodiyirundhaaye, Avan Nammudaiya Uravin Muraiyaan Allavaa? Idho, Avan Indru Raaththiri Kalaththile Vaarkodhumai Thootruvaan.
3 nee Kuliththu, Enney Poosi, Un Vasthirangalai Uduththikkondu, Andha Kalaththirku Po; Andha Manushan Pusiththu Kudiththu Theerumattum Avan Kannukku Edhirppadaamaliru.

4 avan Paduththukkondapodhu, Avan Paduththirukkum Idaththai Nee Paarththirundhu Poi, Avan Kaalgalinmel Moodiyirukkira Porvaiyai Odhukki Nee Paduththukkol; Appozhudhu Nee Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Avan Unakku Solluvaan Endraal.
5 adharku Aval: Neer Enakku Sonnapadiyellaam Seyven Endraal.
6 aval Kalaththirkuppoi, Than Maami Thanakkuk Karpiththabadiyellaam Seydhaal.

7 povaas Pusiththu Kudiththu, Magizhchchiyaayirundhu, Oru Ampaaraththu Adiyile Vandhu Paduththukkondaan. Appozhudhu Aval: Mellappoi, Avan Kaalgalinmel Moodiyirukkira Porvaiyai Odhukki Paduththukkondaal.
8 paadhiraaththiriyile, Andha Manushan Arundu, Thirumbi, Oru Sthiree Than Paadhaththandaiyile Paduththirukkiradhai Kandu,
9 nee Yaar Endru Kettaan; Aval, Naan Ummudaiya Aiyaalaagiya Rooth; Neer Ummudaiya Adiyaalmel Ummudaiya Porvaiyai Viriyum; Neer Sudhandharavaali Endraal.

10 adharku Avan: Magale, Nee Karththaraal Aaseervadhikkappaduvaayaaga; Nee Thariththirarum Aisuvariyavaangalumaana Vaalipargalin Pirage Pogaadhadhinaal, Un Mundhina Nargunaththaippaarkkilum Un Pindhina Nargunam Uththamamaayirukkiradhu.
11 ippodhum Magale, Nee Bayappadaadhe; Unakku Vendiyabadiyellaam Seyven; Nee Gunasaali Enbadhai En Janamaagiya Ooraarellaarum Arivaargal.
12 naan Sudhandharavaali Enbadhu Meydhaan; Aanaalum Ennilum Kittina Sudhandharavaali Oruvan Irukkiraan.

13 raaththirikku Thangiyiru; Naalaikku Avan Unnai Sudhandharamuraiyaai Vivaagampanna Sammadhiththaal Nalladhu, Avan Vivaagampannattum; Avan Unnai Vivaagam Panna Manadhillaadhirundhaaneyaagil, Naan Unnai Sudhandharamuraiyaai Vivaagampannuven Endru Karththarudaiya Jeevanaikkondu Aanaiyidugiren; Vidiyarkaalamattum Paduththu Kondiru Endraan.

14 aval Vidiyarkaalamattum Avan Paadhaththandaiyil Paduththirundhu, Kalaththile Oru Sthiree Vandhadhaaga Oruvarukkum Therivikkavendaam Endru Avan Solliyirundhabadiyaal, Oruvar Mugam Oruvarukku Theriyaadhadharku Munne Ezhundhirundhaal.

15 avan Avalai Nokki: Nee Porththukkondirukkira Porvaiyai Viriththuppidi Endraan; Aval Adhai Pidiththapodhu, Avan Adhile Aarupadi Vaarkodhumaiyai Alandhupottu, Avalmel Thookkivittu, Pattanaththirku Purappattuvandhaan.
16 aval Than Maamiyinidaththil Vandhapodhu, Aval: En Magale, Un Seydhi Enna Endru Kettaal; Appozhudhu Aval: Andha Manushan Thanakku Seydhadhaiyellaam Avalukku Vivariththaal.
17 melum Avar, Nee Un Maamiyaarandaikku Verumaiyaai Pogavendaam Endru Solli, Indha Aarupadi Vaarkodhumaiyai Enakku Koduththaar Endraal.
18 appozhudhu Aval: En Magale, Indha Kaariyam Ennamaai Mudiyum Endru Nee Ariyumattum Poruththiru; Andha Manushan Indraikku Indha Kaariyaththai Mudikkumun Ilaippaaramaattaan Endraal.
